title.text: A template matching approach for detecting pronunciation mismatch

abstractContent.text: In this paper, we study the usefulness of the best path and the complete trellis in dynamic programming based template matching approach for detecting pronunciation mismatch.
We show that there exists cues in trellis (a matrix representing all paths), which could be exploited for detecting pronunciation mismatch.
Such an approach could be used to build a template based approach for detecting pronunciation mismatch independent of the language.
